thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com | 81 of 1356
thread.title: Smalltown ISD

author: Smalltown ISD
title: Smalltown ISD
text:
Spent the better part of 2 days trying to locate stage light bulbs at a reasonable price. Came across 1000bulbs and saved about $8 per bulb!
Got ready to order and realized we were being charged sales tax. Made call to 1-800 number and emailed tax exempt certificate to customer service rep. Got response and sales tax removed in less than 5 minutes!!!!
Placed order. Highly recommend this company to anyone looking for bulbs at a great price!
